ca.cmput301w14t09

Class TopCommentsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListActivity
      • ca.cmput301w14t09.TopCommentsActivity

  • public class TopCommentsActivity
extends ListActivity
    Author:
    ssowemim, Conner TopCommentsActivity handles all the functions that the pop_up_comment.xml has to offer. Controlling the longitude & latitude. Attaching a picture to a comment. Most of the code referring to handling the picture is taken from http://www.androidhive.info/2013/09/android-working-with-camera-api/ Making a comment with an author.
